mapper.select: select aa.month_stat,bb.sportType_name,aa.tot_totalDistance,aa.tot_duration from ( select month_stat, sportType, sum(totalDistance) as tot_totalDistance, sum(duration) as tot_duration from ( select substr(Pdate, 1, 6) as month_stat, sportType, totalDistance,duration from haylou_datawares.dwd_sport_usr_motion_dt_dfs where Pdate < toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(now()))) and Pdate >= toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -6)))) ) a group by a.month_stat, sportType ) aa left join haylou_datawares.dim_sportType_info_dfs bb on (aa.sportType = bb.sportType) order by aa.month_stat,bb.sportType_name asc

select a.month_stat, sum(a.totalSteps) as totSteps from ( select substr(Pdate, 1, 6) as month_stat, totalSteps from haylou_datawares.dwd_sport_usr_motion_dt_dfs where Pdate < toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(now()))) and Pdate >= toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -6)))) ) a group by a.month_stat order by a.month_stat asc

select a.month_stat, sum(totalKcal) as totalKcal from ( select substr(Pdate, 1, 6) as month_stat, totalKcal from haylou_datawares.dwd_sport_usr_motion_dt_dfs where Pdate < toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(now()))) and Pdate >= toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -6)))) ) a group by a.month_stat order by a.month_stat asc

select bb.sportType_name, aa.sport_ration from ( select aa.sportType,aa.cnt,round(aa.cnt*1.0/bb.tot_cnt,2) as sport_ration from ( select sportType, count() as cnt from ( select sportType from haylou_datawares.dwd_sport_usr_motion_dt_dfs where Pdate < toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(now()))) and Pdate >= toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -6)))) ) a group by sportType ) aa,( select count() as tot_cnt from haylou_datawares.dwd_sport_usr_motion_dt_dfs where Pdate <toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(now()))) and Pdate >= toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -6)))) ) bb ) aa left join haylou_datawares.dim_sportType_info_dfs bb on (aa.sportType = bb.sportType) order by bb.sportType_name asc
